alert.note: Alert for Clayton; DeKalb; Fayette; Henry; Newton; North Fulton; Rockdale; South Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 6:40PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A line of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Rockdale, southern DeKalb, northeastern Fayette, northern Henry, southwestern Walton, south central Fulton, Clayton and Newton Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 640 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Jersey to near Conyers to near Cascade Heights, and moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, McDonough, Conyers, Covington, Jonesboro, City of South Fulton, East Point, Stockbridge, Forest Park, Riverdale, College Park, Morrow, Hapeville, Lake City, Oxford, Porterdale, Walnut Grove, Jersey, Hartsfield-Jackson Airport and Lakeview Estates. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.

area.areaDesc: Clayton; DeKalb; Fayette; Henry; Newton; North Fulton; Rockdale; South Fulton
